item.title: docs add
item.description:
docs add by TS :
Adding the "how tos" from the site-author to this plugin.

item.title: code add
item.description: code add by TS : Extending the dispatcher with an internal format. This internal format is our xdoc or xhtml2. The internal format will then be contacted by e.g. html contracts.

item.title: admin add
item.description:
admin add by TS :
Initial plugin code extracted from the old views plugin.

item.title: code add
item.description: code add by TS : Added first implementation of the dispatcher. Including contract bean implementation and interface; dispatcher exception and dispatcher transformers.

item.title: docs add
item.description:
docs add by TS :
Added infos of the pattern the plugin is using.
